title: A lamentation from Rome, how the Pope doth bewayle, that the rebelles in England can not preuayle to the tune of Rowe well ye mariners.
author: Preston, Thomas, 1537-1598.
publisher: In Fletestrete at the signe of the Faulcon by Wylliam Gryffith, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Sainte Dunstones Churchyard,
notes: A song - "All you that newes would here,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
